name: Explosive Temper
description:
Install instructions

Explosive Temper is a 2D Jump n' Run where you Play a bomb and Need to get through the Level by exdploding and dodging traps. You can Play 4 different bombs and can choose how much time you can play before the bomb explodes. The main Goal is to get the Princessbomb and explode together with her. 

This game was developed at the Hochschule-Trier in Germany during an Event called GameDevWeek(https://sites.google.com/view/gamedevweek/startseite)

We were a Team of 4 Students:
- Lorenz Fischer(All Art)
- René Herrmann(Coding, UI)
- Christian Kehler(Coding, Level Design)
- Tommé Nöll (Coding, General)
